item.title: Push Swap but actually Push Rotate
item.description: Push Swap is a 42 School Project where you must sort a list of numbers using 2 stacks and a limited set of operations. You use 2 stacks A and B. The full list of unsorted numbers will input into A, then using the allowed operations you must sort the list into ascending order in stack A. Your algorithm needs to return the list of operations to perform to sort the list.
